item.title: Why should dungeons have factions?
item.description:
Question mark?

It occurred to me only after writing up Analysis of the Jakalla Map II that I sort of naturally assumed dungeons should have factions. I’m 100% confident that I’ve read this somewhere, and it seems intuitively right. But why? And what should they do? I’ll first try to give my own answer, probably based on half-remembered blog posts, and then try to give due credit by discussing what other people have said.
